verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I need Thee every hour, most gracious Lord; No tender voice like Thine can peace afford.

verse.lines: I need Thee every hour, stay Thou nearby; Temptations lose their powâ€™r when Thou art nigh.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I need Thee every hour, in joy or pain; Come quickly and abide, or life is vain.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: I need Thee every hour; teach me Thy will; And Thy rich promises in me fulfill.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: I need Thee every hour, most Holy One; Oh, make me Thine indeed, Thou blessed Son.
